description: Provided information to space "A" travelers as well as PCS customers.
Loaded over 5,000 60 to 75lb bags on state of the art Air Force "X" ray equipment.
Provided force protection security for the AMC military terminal.
Monitored all illegal material using the available x — ray, explosive and narcotics detection, magnetometer, hand held scanning equipment, and video monitoring camera.
Ensured compliance with regulations regarding prohibited items for air transportation.
Inspected, maintained, and repaired aircraft mechanical and electrical armament/ordnance systems.
Stowed, assembled, and loaded aviation ammunition including aerial mines, torpedoes, missiles, and rockets.
Supervised operation of aviation ordnance shops, armories, and stowage facilities.
Loaded supplementary munitions, assembled, tested, and maintained air-launched guided missiles.
Performed scheduled/unscheduled maintenance and ordnance loading/downloading evolutions on various aircraft types.
Supervised, inventoried, stored, and ordered merchandise for Top Gun pilot school.
Cashier responsibilities, Excel spreadsheet database management, currency handling, and bank handling.
Efficiently managed over $60,000 worth of merchandise and $50,000 worth of MWR funds and transactions.
